thread.title: Laid-back Black Hammer Brewery pounds out seriously geeky brews
thread.title_full: Laid-back Black Hammer Brewery pounds out seriously geeky brews - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Esther Mobley
title: Laid-back Black Hammer Brewery pounds out seriously geeky brews
text:
Photo: John Storey, Special To The Chronicle People have beers at Black Hammer Brewing in San Francisco. People have beers at Black Hammer Brewing in San Francisco.
The man sitting next to me at the bar of Black Hammer Brewing leans over, as if to tell me a secret. “I’ve been following these beers since Bryan was giving them away for free out of his garage,” he says. People have beers at Black Hammer Brewing in San Francisco. People have beers at Black Hammer Brewing in San Francisco.
